attributes.action: make the producers of 'Nik-Naks' (Golden Wonder Ltd.) bring back the Scampi 'N' Lemon flavour of the aforementioned product on a permenant basis. We understand that this might be somewhat difficult for the prime minister to accomplish, but lets start with savories and work up to the important stuff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
